text:
As vaccines for the #coronavirus are rolled out across the UK, @DHSCgovuk answers your questions including who will receive the vaccine, can you choose which one and will the #vaccine prevent transmission? 🧐

Read their latest Q&A 👉 https://t.co/PUGw4RrmeV
